website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Predator Z35 is a massive 35-inch curved monitor designed for gaming. It features Nvidia's G-Sync anti-tearing technology and offers smooth gameplay, but its color accuracy and gray-scale performance could be better.
pros: Good gaming performance in our tests
cons: Middling color and gray-scale performance in testing

customer_reviews.title: Had it 2 years and it’s fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this the Christmas before last and it has had hard use ever since. Fantastic quality screen, great image quality. It can be overclocked but we don’t need it. My son plays a lot of fast gaming and it copes very well. I use it with surfing the web and orders etc and it’s perfect for me as I’m sight impaired and the clarity and size is great. Well worth the purchase price..
customer_reviews.author: diagruntled

customer_reviews.title: An awesome gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: A monstrous monitor. Big and heavy, provided an immersive gaming experience during 1 year of use. Only downside is the resolution, 1080p.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Clarke

customer_reviews.title: PC Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good monitor I can only speak from a layman's point of view as I not sure on the technical but it a nice sharp image with good colour but it is a bit heavy and the curved screen works well especially in low light as your peripheral vision comes more into play I think I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: hancock

customer_reviews.title: This was a good purchase and very satisfied for my gaming etc needs
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase and very satisfied for my gaming etc needs. The only slight complaint is the connections are at back of screen and can be awkward. Great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ang63

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixels on first one, replacement ordered yet same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A good gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: the monitor is really good in my opinion for working in my case CAD and gaming. it is worth the amount i payed for it. the only downside is the cable management and that it is a bit difficult to plug cables in when it is on the stand. The cable management is not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with non-faulty units
customer_reviews.text: Beast of monitor, unfortunately had to return due to faulty unit (display port did not work)
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when used with ULMB instead G-Sync
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when used with ULMB instead G-Sync. Best BIG ultra-wide screen if you don't mind lower pixel density and want to keep high FPS rate on singe graphic card (tested on GTX 1080)
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! For the price u get all u need
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Blurred expectations
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to screen blur on darker images and during games, apparently this is common with VA panels and a known issue by ACER. It's a shame really as it looked really good and the curve is just right on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mallie21

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, but make sure your GFX supports it.
customer_reviews.text: A good quality and very energy efficient monitor (though the monitor is 47W, not 18W as listed on the technical specification section above) that can help you get the best performance out of your NVIDIA graphics card, but be forewarned that you will need a graphics card with a DisplayPort connection if you wish to use the G-Sync functionality; G-Sync is not supported through the HDMI connection, so check the specs on your graphics card before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Licinio S. Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: also feels like the screen stutters/tears due to the curve
customer_reviews.text: Monitor has a very serious case of ghosting at all hz, originally thought the issue was with the panel, after having it replaced once i discovered it was a problem with this model. Any dark areas will blur when moving your mouse horizontally, also feels like the screen stutters/tears due to the curve. This happens on my Gtx 1070 with i5-4690k. Very expensive and doesn't have the clearest resolution using dp, would expect full hd but films and games are very pixelated and will hurt your eyes/brain in a few weeks of use. Would not recommend this to anyone. X34 or tripple monitor setup
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product cannot fault this in any way highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity and picture
customer_reviews.text: Great clarity and picture. Would of liked a remote control to help with the adjustments so only gets 4stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Good looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good looking monitor, but flickers like a strobe machine if it's left on for more than 5 hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricy, but compared to asus wide screens this is the best value for money. No dead pixels or light leaks as found with asus production line screens. Acer quality control seems to be more reliable (seen in other reviews and youtube reviews of both asus and acer) Very immersive for gamers, also has hdmi 1.4 giving 60fps for consoles (if you wanna console game on the side). No noticeable input lag, nice colours especially compared to an old school tn panel. But make sure you have a pc and graphics card which can use this screen to is full potential.
customer_reviews.author: R.Chagz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible picture
customer_reviews.text: The image on this was terrible, as per other reviews - bad resolution for the size, excessive light bleed etc. I returned it, yet Amazon keep asking me to answer questions on it - well, don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming monitor i've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Somehow didn't expect it to be quire as large as it is, looks truly amazing on my desk. fps games are awesome as its like having true peripheral vision. Also looks amazing when playing any top down games.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Oh what a monitor
customer_reviews.text: I had a 4k Dell before this which was beautiful, but for gaming, a total nightmare, the world isn't ready for 4k gaming yet so I sent it back and bought this... ahhhhh It's so smooth, the frame rate and Nvidia G-Sync are a joy to behold. I have an NVidia 970GTX and most things run in Ultra for me and coupled with this (OMG you should see DOOM) well, enough said. It's a big monitor and the base is quite big so measure and make sure you have enough room!
customer_reviews.author: MR W A LEE

customer_reviews.title: so you ned to lose all the extras to make it work USELESS PIECE OF
customer_reviews.text: im all games shadows and screen bleeding. there was a fix, turn on G-sync and lower refresh rate to 120.. so you ned to lose all the extras to make it work USELESS PIECE OF RUBBISH
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Monitor failed after 4 months use - dreadful customer service by ACER falsely accusing us of accidental damage.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor failed after 4 months use - diabolical customer service by the manufacturer who accused us of damaging the product and would not replace under warranty whilst offering no evidence to support accidental damage. I suggest you DO NOT BUY products from from ACER.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. O'kelly

customer_reviews.title: The Best monitor i have ever owned. connect to a Geforce GTX980 pur
customer_reviews.text: Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate. Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May, And summer’s lease hath all too short a date. Sometime too hot the eye of heaven shines, And often is his gold complexion dimmed; And every fair from fair sometime declines, By chance, or nature’s changing course, untrimmed; But thy eternal summer shall not fade, Nor lose possession of that fair thou ow’st, Nor shall death brag thou wand’rest in his shade, When in eternal lines to Time thou grow’st. So long as men can breathe, or eyes can see, So long lives this, and this gives life to thee.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall very nice monitor, just the screen size can be harsh on your eyes on closer up usage, and slight ghosting is noticed. But run at 120hz there is hardly any ghosting.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with product and seller. Ultra fast delivery and great quality monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You expect me to pay £610 for a monitor with a 4ms response time...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: Acer Predator Z35 35 inch Widescreen Curved Monitor (21:9, VA, LED, 144 Hz, 4 ms, G-Sync v2, 100M:1, Euro/UK, Acer EcoDisplay) - Black/Red
product_meta.description:
Acer Predator Z35 35 inch Widescreen Curved Monitor (21:9, VA, LED, 144 Hz, 4 ms, G-Sync v2, 100M:1, Euro/UK, Acer EcoDisplay) - Black/Red.

Get the adrenaline-fueled joyride you've always wanted. Slam the thrusters and boost up to top speed.

Take in the full view. The curved, panoramic 1800R3view. A view that pulls you in, wraps around your vision and refuses to let go.

It’s a new beginning. With NVIDIA G-SYNC,you’ve entered a world where frames are seamless and perfect.

Predator GameView technology allows you to adjust dark boost levels, make precise color adjustments and set up aim points for hip-fire accuracy. Save custom settings in three profiles you can switch between at any time.

































LEGAL DISCLAIMER
new

BOX CONTAINS
Monitor, power cable, connectivity cable(s) - HDMI, DP, USB3.0

See more
feature_bullets: 35 inch Curved 2000R UltraWide Full HD resolution, LED gaming monitor and VA panel technology
NVIDIA G-Sync technology for smooth gaming
200 Hz refresh rate gives you all the speed you need to dominate your opponents and get the most out of your graphics card
4 ms response time for smoother and responsive gaming

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
